org.springframework.restdocs.restassured3.operation.preprocess

Class RestAssuredPreprocessors

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.restdocs.restassured3.operation.preprocess.RestAssuredPreprocessors
  • Deprecated. 
    since 2.0.1 in favor of Preprocessors and, specifically, Preprocessors.modifyUris()

    @Deprecated
public abstract class RestAssuredPreprocessors
extends java.lang.Object
    Static factory methods for creating OperationPreprocessors for use with REST Assured 3. They can be applied to an Operation's request or response before it is documented.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Andy Wilkinson

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static UriModifyingOperationPreprocessor modifyUris()
      Deprecated. 
      since 2.0.1 in favor of Preprocessors.modifyUris()

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • modifyUris

        @Deprecated
public static UriModifyingOperationPreprocessor modifyUris()
        Deprecated. since 2.0.1 in favor of Preprocessors.modifyUris()
        Returns a UriModifyingOperationPreprocessor that will modify URIs in the request or response by changing one or more of their host, scheme, and port.
        Returns:
        the preprocessor
